articles.description: Rhode Island guard E.C. Matthews has been given the go-ahead to play against St. Bonaventure on Friday night, three days after the 16th-ranked Rams' second-leading scorer hurt his left knee.
articles.headline: Rhode Island guard E.C. Matthews given go-ahead to play after hurting left knee

articles.description: USC's Bennie Boatwright, who was averaging 13.6 points and 6.4 rebounds per game, is out for the season with a knee injury.
articles.headline: USC's Bennie Boatwright out for season with knee injury

images.caption: Junior Bennie Boatwright is USC's second-leading scorer.
images.name: Bennie Boatwright [600x400]

articles.description: USC's investigation into the college basketball bribery scandal found no institutional neglect by its program. Athletic director Lynn Swann said then-assistant coach Tony Bland "was operating outside [the] boundaries."
articles.headline: USC probe finds no institutional neglect; Tony Bland acted 'outside boundaries'

articles.description: Gary Chivichyan set career highs with eight 3-pointers and 25 points, Jared Stutzman had four 3s and 20 points, including the go-ahead jumper with 41 seconds left, and Idaho State beat Sacramento State 67-60 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Idaho State hits 12 3s in 67-60 win over Sacramento State

articles.description: The Wildcats have owned the Big East, but recent losses have opened the door for the Musketeers to take the league, starting with Saturday's matchup.
articles.headline: Weekend lookahead: Xavier, Villanova battle for Big East supremacy

images.caption: Xavier can avenge its Jan. 10 loss to Villanova when the Wildcats visit on Saturday.
images.name: Tyrique Jones [576x324]

articles.description: In a league as competitive as the Big 12, opportunities abound for quality wins. The problem, as Texas and Oklahoma are learning in recent weeks, is winning those games. Will the Longhorns or Sooners end their losing streaks this weekend?
articles.headline: Bubble Watch: Struggling to survive in a rugged Big 12

images.caption: Texas wants to end its three-game losing streak on Saturday against Oklahoma.
images.name: Bamba_Mohamed 180213 [608x342]

images.caption: Deandre Ayton scores 25 points and grabs 16 rebounds as No. 17 Arizona holds off No. 25 Arizona State, 77-70.
images.name: Arizona completes season sweep of Arizona State
